Unknown.translation: Just as a mother has many sons but one in her lap is the dearest to her;

Unknown.translation: The elder sons remain engrossed in their commercial activities but one in lap is ignorant of all allurements of wealth, commodities and love of brothers and sisters;

Unknown.translation: Leaving the innocent baby in a cradle, the mother keeps attending other domestic chores but listening to the baby's cry, she comes running and feeds the child.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpw Koie joeI gur crin srin ghy; rhy inrdoK moK And ibnod ko [392[

Unknown.translation: Like the innocent child, he who loses his self and takes the refuge of the holy feet of the True Guru, is blessed with the consecration of Naam-Simran-Mantar that saves him from the worldly vices; and relishing the bliss of Naam Simran he achieves salvati
